item.title: Wallpaper Pack 16: Aurora Glow Levels
item.description: A calming wallpaper pack inspired by the northern lights. Includes multiple device sizes for desktop, tablet, and mobile.

item.description: A tranquil gradient wallpaper pack inspired by the colors of auroras and soft northern light â€” deep navy, teal, and gentle rose fading into morning calm. Includes multiple device sizes for desktop, tablet, and mobile.
